title: Airport Madness: World Edition
notes: The game starts fullscreen, if you then go to a window, you can't go back to proper fullscreen.

title: Airport Madness: World Edition
notes:
Unfortunately I have to downgrade my previous rating due to the following issues:

Performance: continuous play, on "Madness" amount of planes, on the Zurich airport, after 280/300 planes: frames per seconds dropped significantly, and very sluggish input. I think it could lead up to crashes later on. I just shut the game down and restarted fresh.

Error: Maybe some kind of memory leak in Wine/Proton? The game isn't demanding graphically or computationally, I think. So there must be something else that's lowering performance over time.

Tried the Building Traffic mode. The game itself is perfectly playable.
Performance slowly but surely gets worse over time, slowing down the game speed. Switching to windowed mode is not really possible as, when you turn off fullscreen, a giant black window with only a tiny fraction being the game appears.
title: Airport Madness: World Edition
